00029 #define EIG_MAX 2
00030 #define ABORTED_PROCEDURE   (-7)
00031 #define COMPLEX_EIGENVALUE  (-7)
00032 #define SUCCESSFUL_PROCEDURE  2
00033 #define EPS 1e-30
00034

00051 class RarefactionFlow: public WaveFlow{
00052     
00053 private:
00054     
00055     
00056     int familyIndex_;
00057     
00058     int timeDirection_;
00059     
00060     RealVector * referenceVector_;
00061     
00062     double lambda_;
00063 
00064     int rarefaction(int *neq, double *xi, double *in, double *out, int *nparam, double *param) const ;
00065     
00066     struct eigen{
00067         double r;            // Eigenvalue's real part
00068         double i;            // Eigenvalue's imaginary part
00069         double vlr[EIG_MAX]; // Left-eigenvector's real part
00070         double vli[EIG_MAX]; // Left-eigenvector's imaginary part
00071         double vrr[EIG_MAX]; // Right-eigenvector's real part
00072         double vri[EIG_MAX]; // Right-eigenvector's imaginary part
00073         
00074         int n: EIG_MAX;     // Probably not necessary!
00075         // See what is to be done in case of non-trivial Jordan canonical forms
00076     };
00077     
00078     
00079     // Eigenproblem
00080 // This function computes the eigenvalues and left- and right-eigenvectors of a matrix
00081 // using LAPACK's dgeev and sorts them according to the value of the real part
00082 // of the eigenvalues, in crescent order.
00083 //
00084 // The parameters are:
00085 //
00086 //     n: Dimension of the field and therefore of the matrix (n*n). Probably not necessary.
00087 //     A: The n*n matrix.
00088 //     e: The array of struct eigen where the eigencouples will be stored.
00089 //
00090 // The function returns:
00091 //
00092 //     ABORTED_PROCEDURE:   LAPACK's dgeev returned info != 0, there was a problem. This
00093 //                          should never happen.
00094 //     SUCCESFUL_PROCEDURE: Everything's OK.
00095 //
00096     int cdgeev(int n, double *A, struct eigen *e)const ;
00097     
00098     void transpose(double A[], int n)const;
00099     
00100     void fill_eigen(struct eigen e[], double rp[], double ip[], double vl[], double vr[])const ;
00101     
00102     void sort_eigen(struct eigen e[])const ;
00103     
00104     static int eigen_comp(const void *p1, const void *p2);
00105     
00106     void applyH(int n, double *xi, double *H, double *eta, double *out)const ;
00107     
00108     double prodint(int n, double *a, double *b)const ;
00109     
00110     void matrixmult(int m, int p, int n, double *A, double *B, double *C)const ;
00111     
00112     int flow(int n, int family, double *in,  double *out) const;
00113     
00114     
00115     
00116     
00117 public:
00118     int jet(const WaveState &u, JetMatrix &m, int degree) const ;
00119     
00120     RarefactionFlow(const int, const int ,const FluxFunction &);
00121     
00122     RarefactionFlow(const RarefactionFlow &);
00123     
00124     const RealVector & getReferenceVector() const;
00125     
00126     void setReferenceVector(const RealVector & );
00127     
00128     RpFunction * clone() const;
00129     
00130     double lambdaCalc(const WaveState & , int );
00131     
00132     virtual ~RarefactionFlow();
00133     
00134     void setLambda(const double );
00135     double getLambda();
00136     
00137     int getFamilyIndex() const;
00138     void setFamilyIndex(int);
00139     
00140     int direction()const ;
00141     void setDirection(int);
00142     
00143 };

00146 inline void RarefactionFlow::setLambda(const double lambda){lambda_=lambda;}
00147 
00148 inline double RarefactionFlow::getLambda(){return lambda_;}
00149 
00150 inline int RarefactionFlow::getFamilyIndex() const{return familyIndex_;}
00151 
00152 inline void RarefactionFlow::setFamilyIndex(int familyIndex ) {familyIndex_=familyIndex;}
00153 
00154 inline int RarefactionFlow::direction() const{return timeDirection_;}
00155 
00156 inline void RarefactionFlow::setDirection(int timeDirection){timeDirection_=timeDirection;}
00157 
00158 
00159 inline double RarefactionFlow::prodint(int n, double *a, double *b)const {
00160     int incx = 1, incy = 1;
00161     return ddot_(&n, a, &incx, b, &incy);
00162 }
00163 
00164 
00165 inline const RealVector & RarefactionFlow::getReferenceVector() const {return *referenceVector_;}
00166 
00167 inline void RarefactionFlow::setReferenceVector(const RealVector & referenceVector){
00168     delete referenceVector_;
00169     referenceVector_=new RealVector(referenceVector);
00170 }
